text: Sladest is a 1973 rock album by English band Slade. It was the band's first UK compilation, mixing all the band's hit singles with some songs from before the band's fame. A successful album, it went to number one in the UK. ==Track listing== == Other webcites == * Sladest on AllMusic * Sladest on Discogs Category:1973 albums Category:Slade albums Category:Glam rock albums
title: Sladest
